entry.title: My inbox PO enhancement with PO Changes as a composition
entry.content:
Hello, i'm trying to add a table of PO Changes made using CDS View into the Purchase Order Approval detail page in My Inbox.

I tried the mentioned blog below, but no success yet.

https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-q-a/my-inbox-po-enhancement-with-approvers-as-a-composition/qaa-p/12673395#M4754835

I made the following CDS View to show the purchase changes and added it to C_PurchaseOrderFs Extension.

After that, i made a enhancement into MPC_EXT as mentioned in the blog trying to add the association into the Metadata of the SEGW service C_PURCHASEORDER_FS.

 

But, the change is not reflecting yet in the My Inbox App, i only see a new area with the title but no table is displayed there.
i have already tried to extend the SEGW service, but it does not work with My inbox. I also tried a new service, but that didn't work also. As i understood from the blog, the guys were able to solve it using the standard service and adding some enhancement only, but the main problem here is that i'm not able to see the associations and also, i'm unable to add the associations. 
Do you guys have any idea on how i could solve it?

thanks.

entry.title: Odata metadata error : Model 'ZGW_XXX_MDL_0001_BE' contains errors. Contact Adminstrator
entry.content:
We are experiencing a failure in metadata calls from the application in our environment. The issue is impacting the functionality of OData services and causing delays in data retrieval.

Steps Taken:

  1. Cleared Gateway (GW) cache,
  2. Checked the Service maint configuration.
  3. All network and connection are good.

error: Model 'ZGW_SMS_MDL_0001_BE' contains errors. Contact Adminstrator

error id:  /IWFND/MED039

url: /sap/opu/odata/sap/ZGW_XXX_SRV/$metadata

We request assistance in analyzing the root cause of the metadata call failure. Please advise on:

  • Any known issues or patches related to metadata failures.
  • Recommended steps to debug or resolve the issue.
  • Whether additional Gateway or backend configurations need to be reviewed.

Note: we are facing this issue as intermittent.

entry.title: Population of field TECHDESC in table USR21
entry.content:
Since recent upgrade to SAP S/4HANA, we have noticed that some workflows are checking for a value in field TECHDESC in table USR21.

In table USR21 field TECHDESC, we have records that are populated with First Name & Last Name, and we have blank records in that field also.

We would like to know what is the data flow path / update mechanism, for the field TECHDESC to get populated with a value?  Is there a link to HR infotype to obtain the person's first name & last name?


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: What's the best way to call or use my custom Data Provider Class on my v4 OData service?
entry.content:
Since v4 Odata service uses standard class, what's the best approach on calling or using the custom model for data provider class?

Context: My Odata service is connected to custom fiori app. Also, i have created a custom class that contains custom logic. My behavior definition also calls the custom class that I've had created.

Objective: When an action button is used/pressed, I would like to call the class ZCL_QM_TEST which I would like to call the specific action which is get_entity.

Behavior definition code:

managed implementation in class ZCL_TEST unique;
strict ( 2 );

define behavior for Z_TEST_CDS
persistent table qals
lock master
authorization master ( instance )

{
   create;
   update;
   delete;
   field( mandatory ) InpsectionLot;

   action get_entity result [0..*] $self;
}

entry.title: Nested parameterised cds view
entry.content:
Dear SAP Community,
I have been facing issues with nested parameterised views that results into error : "DATABASE RETURN SQL CODE 7 : Feature not supported :Parameterised view with unused Parameter" .

Just to give you a brief ;
I m querying on standard parameterised view from a custom cds view and supplying all input parameters to standard cds view F2_MMIM_MATSTOCKQUANVALBYDATE .

Pls help or give any recommendations to follow the right approach .

Attach find screen shots of cds and error 
Thanks
Anil

entry.title: Performance Issue in 'ME_INFORECORD_MAINTAIN'
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

Recently, we encountered a performance issue when updating the condition price against the material info record using the BAPI - 'ME_INFORECORD_MAINTAIN'.  

After analysing the info record and BAPI, we found that a particular PIR has a certain number (i.e., 800) of existing condition validity periods due to the customer updating the price on a daily basis as per their business. Inside the BAPI, there is a method 'PROCESS_VAL_PERIODS' and a call function 'PROCESS_VAL_PERIODS' for finding all existing validity periods. This function module has the following subroutine, and it takes time to read that much of validity periods.

PERFORM kon_select IN PROGRAM (maintain_program)
USING t180-aktyp no no.

 It has increased the runtime for updating the price of a single material. Is there any alternate approach to boost the performance of the condition price update.

Many thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: LT_FILTER_SELECT_OPTIONS return nothing
entry.content:
Hello everybody,

I have a issue when i send some filters from MDK app to ABAP Odata. When I check the LT_FILTER_SELECT_OPTIONS is blank in ABAP. I think this issue due to MDK send substringof and abap cant not resolve this filter. My filters is like this EntitySet?$top=50&$filter=Lgnum eq '001' and (substringof('ace', Maktx) or substringof('ace', Matnr))

checking LT_FILTER_SELECT_OPTIONS 

the filters are arriving in string but these are not transform in LT_FILTER_SELECT_OPTIONS.

Testing from gateway client

From MDK, these are sending.

 

Best regards,

Angel Gutierrez

entry.title: HTTP failed: INTERNAL_ERROR in SAP Gateway Client for OData Service
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I'm testing an OData service  in the SAP Gateway Client with the Request URI /sap/opu/odata/sap/.../$format=xml using a GET method. I’m encountering an "HTTP failed: INTERNAL_ERROR" message. The Error Log tab shows no additional details yet.

Could you please help me understand how to resolve this INTERNAL_ERROR?  is this a configuration issue or a system problem?

Thank you in advance for your support.

Best regards,
Ashok

entry.title: Parameter has invalid value: Parameter IV_VALUE has invalid value .
entry.content:
Hi All,

Below is my oData URL and when executing from /IWFND/GW_CLIENT

/sap/opu/odata4/sap/api_project_v3/srvd_a2x/sap/project/0001/WBSElement?sap-statistics=true&$top=2

I am getting the below response:
{
"error" : {
"code" : "CX_PARAMETER_INVALID_RANGE",
"message" : "Parameter has invalid value: Parameter IV_VALUE has invalid value .",
"@SAP__common.ExceptionCategory" : "Client_Error",
"details" : [
{
"code" : "/IWCOR/CX_OD_INTERNAL_ERROR/0050569259751EE4BA97133877F61116",
"message" : "In the context of Data Services an unknown internal server error occurred",
"@SAP__common.Severity" : "error",
"@SAP__common.numericSeverity" : 4
},
{
"code" : "/IWCOR/CX_OD_EP_ENTITY_ERROR/0050569259751EE4BA9739C53C899155",
"message" : "Error occurred while processing property 'SchedldBasicEarliestStartDate' of entity with index 1",
"@SAP__common.Severity" : "error",
"@SAP__common.numericSeverity" : 4
},
{
"code" : "/IWCOR/CX_OD_EP_PROPERTY_ERROR/005056A509B11ED1BF822D2D09173A04",
"message" : "Property 'SchedldBasicEarliestStartDate' has invalid value ''",
"@SAP__common.Severity" : "error",
"@SAP__common.numericSeverity" : 4
}
],
"innererror" : {
"ErrorDetails" : {
"@SAP__common.Application" : {
"ComponentId" : "PS-ST",
"ServiceRepository" : "SRVD_A2X",
"ServiceId" : "API_PROJECT_V3",
"ServiceVersion" : "0001"
},
"@SAP__common.TransactionId" : "A2E9BF5D760A0070E0068F0DD38A7ACB",
"@SAP__common.Timestamp" : "20251016161510.514754",
"@SAP__common.ErrorResolution" : {
"Analysis" : "Use ADT feed reader \"SAP Gateway Error Log\" or run transaction /IWFND/ERROR_LOG on SAP Gateway hub system and search for entries with the timestamp above for more details",
"Note" : "See SAP Note 1797736 for error analysis (https://service.sap.com/sap/support/notes/1797736)"
}
}
}
}
}

Did anyone faced this error and please let me know how to resolve this error?

Thanks,

BK

entry.title: Guidance Needed on Linking RFC Function Module Table to Entity Set in OData Service
entry.content:
Dear @OdataExperts,

Please help on below query.

I have created an OData service using the Import → RFC option, and the mapping has been successfully completed with the relevant RFC Function Module. I would now like to understand how to link the Function Module's table (/IWBEP/I_SBD_DS) to a specific Entity Set table (/IWBEP/I_SBO_ES).

Could someone please guide me on how to achieve this?

Written select query:

SELECT a~function_name
INTO TABLE @DATA(lt_table)
FROM /iwbep/i_sbd_ds AS a
JOIN /iwbep/i_sbo_es AS b
ON a~project = b~project
AND a~node_uuid = b~node_uuid
WHERE b~project = 'ZTEST'
AND b~name = 'testSet'.

@thomas_jung@naimesh_patel @AshwinDutt  SAP NetWeaver Application Server for ABAP NW ABAP Gateway (OData) OData 

Thank you in advance!

entry.title: oDATA authentication and target client
entry.content:
Hi all,

I have deployed a SAP Dev environment via CAL to do some tests and developments in area of oDATA services.

I am not that familar with let me call it "basis activites" for oDATA services. But I would like to know:

Authentication method of system / service

oDATA is offering different modes for authentication (i.e. Basis, oAuth, SAML, ...). Where has this to be configured for global system or single services? Do I have to do this via transaction SICF and per knot (incl. childs)?

By default it seems the SAP Dev system is configured with basic authentication.

Is it correct that if I store the login details in the service itself, authentication is no longer necessary?

 

Target client

How does the oData recognize the target client? The SAP dev system has client 000 and 001. First call was send to client 000, however follow up calls are send to 0001. How does the service itself recognize the correct target client or where do I have to maintain it?

 

Regards Chris

entry.title: Malformed syntax error in ODATA for $batch for GET operation
entry.content:
I am trying to test $batch for GET request in ABAP Gateway tcode, but I am getting error Malformed syntax.  However when i execute the get entity seperately it works.

I have attached the snapshots for the same.

Body

--batch
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary
Accept: application/json

GET SalesOrderHeaderSet('5100000030') HTTP/1.1

--batch--

Also, if I understand correctly since I am going to use only GET requests inside the $batch so there is no need to redefine or implement the CHANGESET method.

entry.title: OData Delta extract failing with error RSODP_ODATA042.
entry.content:
Dear Sap Community

We are facing an issue with one custom Delta Extract service where it works for Full extract but after a few delta extracts, it starts failing with error RSODP_ODATA042. 

Full Error message:

Failure happened on 'Source' side. ErrorCode=ODataRequestNotSucceeded,'Type=Microsoft.DataTransfer.Common.Shared.HybridDeliveryException,Message=Requesting response from path DeltaLinksOfFactsOfZEWM_PROD_NEW('D20251113231117_000041000')//ChangesAfter and query $filter=&sap-client=400 failed with status code BadRequest and message <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><error xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ado/2007/08/dataservices/metadata"><code>RSODP_ODATA/042</… xml:lang="en">S:RSODP_ODATA:042</message><innererror><application><component_id/><service_namespace>/SAP/</service_namespace><service_id>ZEWM_PROD_MASTER_ODP_NEW_SRV</service_id><service_version>0001</service_version></application><transactionid>D8C8D15E33990390E006919C91406949</transactionid><timestamp>20251116224624.6897370</timestamp><Error_Resolution><SAP_Transaction>For backend administrators: run transaction /IWFND/ERROR_LOG on SAP Gateway hub system and search for entries with the timestamp above for more details</SAP_Transaction><SAP_Note>See SAP Note 1797736 for error analysis

 

We have tried to create new CDS/Service as well and face same issue again. Also, the message RSODP_ODATA042 does not exists in our EWM system yet where this service call is failing. If we do a Full extract again which resets the Delta counter, it again works for a few times for delta extract before again failing with same error.

entry.title: OData Service: “No system alias found for service” after transport to QA – why is “LOCAL” missing?
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I’ve created an OData service that reads data from a custom table and provides PDF downloads. Everything is fully implemented and working in our development system (DEV). The service also runs fine in the Gateway Client (/IWFND/GW_CLIENT).

After transporting it to QA, I’m getting the following error in the Gateway Client:

500 – No system alias found for service

When I checked the service in QA via /IWFND/MAINT_SERVICE, I noticed that there is no system alias “LOCAL” defined at all.

This confused me because in DEV the service is assigned to the alias “LOCAL”, but in QA it doesn’t exist.

What also makes it strange:

Other OData services in QA and PROD are working fine—even though they also don’t have any system alias assigned. So the system somehow works without explicitly having “LOCAL” configured.

My questions:

Why does “LOCAL” exist in DEV but not in QA/PROD?

Shouldn’t this be consistent?

How is it possible that other OData services work without any system alias at all?

Is the system using some kind of implicit local alias?

What is the correct way to fix this issue for my new OData service?

Do I need to create the alias manually in QA, or is there a better approach?

How can I make sure that existing productive OData services won’t be affected by this configuration?

entry.content:

Getting OData URI PROJSet? $skip=0&$top=5000 issue. When I use $top=1000, it works fine; above $top=1000, I get this error.
